content: what happened to the site with all the good arguments for going to the devdays?
All the good arguments are here: www.fhirdevdays.com
@Rien Wertheim I know! and it is awesome! - but last year you were cocky enough to also have a page listing even more arguments ;)
( I'm almost having an 'Elon Musk moment' when the CEO answers the questions himself. ) - and btw the answer came on zulip before someone has answered on twitter @fhir_furore ;)
Correct. Last year we had a Convince Your Boss letter on the website. You need it?
nope -not anymore (I found it anyways on https://www.fhirdevdays.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/FHIR-DevDays2017-Letter-to-Supervisor.rtf) I'm attending anyways ;)
It is a good letter. I should use that for next WGM. :)
